column3: It was thoughtful {{c1::of}} Chris to come and see me when I was ill.
Why are you so rude {{c1::to}} people? Why can't you be more polite?
I can't understand people who are cruel {{c1::to}} animals.
Thanks for helping me with my luggage. It was very kind {{c1::of}} you.
Laura has been very generous {{c1::to}} me. She's helped me a lot.
It was honest {{c1::of}} Paul to admit he'd made the wrong decision.
